title: Imawa no Kuni no Alice (OVA)
synopsis: Ryouhei Arisu is a high school student with no ambitions and just wants to escape from what he feels is a meaningless reality. One night when he is with his two friends Daikichi Karube and Chouta Segawa, they see an abnormally large firework shoot into the sky, an event which signals a permanent change in their lives.
characters: ['Arisu, Ryouhei', 'Chishiya, Shuntarou', 'Usagi, Yuzuha', 'Karube, Daikichi', 'Segawa, Chouta', 'Shibuki, Saori']
voices: ['Hosoya, Yoshimasa', 'Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Kotobuki, Minako', 'Suzuki, Tatsuhisa', 'Yonaga, Tsubasa', 'Sakamoto, Maaya']
